TITLE: Resisting Indoctrination | Abigail Shrier
SUMMARY: Ben sat down with author Abigail Shrier to discuss her new book 'Bad Therapy: Why the Kids Aren’t Growing Up,' in which Shrier discusses the troubling trend of weaponizing mental health in education and parenting, and explores how an excessive focus on therapy tends to medicalize normal challenges faced by children. So, is the current trend in health practices transforming ordinary childhood challenges into pathological issues? Join us as we delve into this and much more on this episode of The Sunday Special.

TITLE: Introducing 'Mr. Birchum' - The Show Hollywood Wouldn't Touch
SUMMARY: Big news! Tune in to DailyWire+ tonight at 9/8c for the free series premiere of "Mr. Birchum," the animated sitcom Hollywood refused to make for fear of offending the wrong people. Fortunately, we love offending the wrong people. Voiced by Adam Carolla, Mr. Birchum is a no-nonsense teacher grappling with everything from a gaming obsessed son to the JEDI (Justice, Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion) officer, Karponzi, who enforces extreme political correctness. Featuring some of the boldest entertainers in the world—Megyn Kelly, Roseanne Barr, Jay Mohr, Brett Cooper, and more—Mr. Birchum promises not only laughs, but a fearless exploration of contemporary issues. Be there as we challenge the norm with humor that's anything but safe, and remember, episode one is FREE on DailyWire+.

TITLE: Oppression to Empowerment | Ayaan Hirsi Ali
SUMMARY: Born in Mogadishu, Somalia, Ayaan Hirsi Ali's journey is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit. Raised in a devout Somali Muslim family, Ayaan received a strict Muslim education and fled a forced marriage. Armed only with intellectual curiosity and unwavering determination, she sought refuge in the Netherlands, where she was first exposed to the ideas of the West. It was here that she found her voice, her passion for women's rights, and her commitment to challenging the status quo. Ayaan has become a prominent voice for reform within Islam and has dedicated her life to advocating for the rights of women, minorities, and dissidents living under oppressive regimes. Tune in for a compelling dialogue with one of the world's most fearless voices.

TITLE: Ep. 1963 - Revenge Of The Normies
SUMMARY: The army of losers is on the march globally, and they’ve taken Joe Biden hostage; the Biden White House drops a mind-boggling leak on their strategy with Hamas; and the normies strike back.

TITLE: Ep. 1964 - Disney Erases Tinker Bell
SUMMARY: University of North Carolina cuts DEI funding while Disney cuts Tinker Bell; the political earthquake has already happened, the wave just hasn’t reached shore yet; and the White House continues to present zero solutions and exacerbate problems in the Middle East.

TITLE: Ep. 1965 - Biden WANTS To Debate Trump!
SUMMARY: Joe Biden says he wants to debate Trump…twice; Biden’s inflation data continues to stagnate as he pushes new inflationary policies; the White House continues to try to stop Israeli victory in Gaza.

TITLE: Ep. 1966 - NFL Kicker SLAMMED For Defending Christianity
SUMMARY: Kansas City Chiefs kicker Harrison Butker finds himself under fire for defending Catholicism…at a Catholic university; Joe Biden’s suspiciously smooth debate logistics suggest he’s got a plan to sandbag Donald Trump; and the Biden administration finds political allies in Israel.

TITLE: Ep. 1967 - We Filled Washington DC With Complete IMBECILES
SUMMARY: Congress shows its true face with a stunningly intellectual debate between Marjorie Taylor Greene, AOC, and Jasmine Crockett; the Biden White House declares executive privilege over tapes of the president’s criminal investigation interview; and Kamala Harris says she wants to debate, too.

TITLE: Not Everything Is About Race | Coleman Hughes
SUMMARY: Today, we welcome Coleman Hughes, a writer and podcaster known for his influential work on race, politics, and culture. Named to Forbes' 30 Under 30 in 2021, Hughes has written for major publications and testified before Congress against reparations. In his 2024 book, "The End of Race Politics: Arguments for a Colorblind America," he advocates for a colorblind approach to politics. We discuss his viral appearance on The View, race relations, and more, highlighting his commitment to fostering dialogue on contentious issues.

TITLE: Ep. 1968 - IRANIAN PRESIDENT DEAD IN HELICOPTER CRASH
SUMMARY: Iran’s president is dead in a helicopter crash; the International Criminal Court tries to bring charges against the Prime Minister of Israel; and Americans remain dour on the economy, even as Joe Biden panders for black votes at Morehouse College.

TITLE: Ep. 1969 - Why The West Mourns the ‘Butcher of Tehran’
SUMMARY: After the shocking but welcome demise of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, the West sends a weird batch of condolences; Europe and the US struggle to deal with the hijacking of the International Criminal Court; and Democrats try to sanctify the memory of Michael Brown.

TITLE: DAILY WIRE BACKSTAGE: INTRODUCING THE 2ND GREATEST COMMERCIAL EVER
SUMMARY: Backstage has a reputation for surprises, and we just raised the bar. Jeremy Boreing shocked everyone with the launch of Jeremy’s Razors: The 2nd Greatest Commercial Ever. Plus, the guys break down the state of The American Experiment: where we are now and what's next, explore the conception of freedom, dissect the Trump vs. Biden debate, and much more. Watch now for sharp insights, big laughs, and the boldness that defines The Daily Wire. You won't believe, or expect, what happens next!

TITLE: Ep. 1970 - The New Trump Nazi Lie
SUMMARY: The Biden campaign leaps on a retweeted video from President Trump to claim he’s a crypto-Nazi; the German legislature votes for lower sentences for child pornography; and the world continues to mourn the death of Iran’s butcher president.

TITLE: Ep. 1971 - Kill and Rape Jews, Win a State!
SUMMARY: Ireland, Norway, and Spain declare their recognition of a fake State of Palestine; Joe Biden continues to trail in the polls; and Nikki Haley endorses Donald Trump.

TITLE: Daily Wire Backstage: Introducing the 2nd Greatest Commercial Ever
SUMMARY: Backstage has a reputation for surprises, and we just raised the bar. Jeremy Boreing shocked everyone with the launch of Jeremy’s Razors: The 2nd Greatest Commercial Ever. Plus, the guys break down the state of The American Experiment: where we are now and what's next, explore the conception of freedom, dissect the Trump vs. Biden debate, and much more. Watch now for sharp insights, big laughs, and the boldness that defines The Daily Wire. You won't believe, or expect, what happens next!

TITLE: Ep. 1972 - Joe Biden Doesn’t Give A S*** About You
SUMMARY: The Biden campaign tries to play the “sympathetic old man” card, but it isn’t working; we examine the polls on how Americans feel about the economy; and Israel says it won’t be deterred by the so-called “international community.”

TITLE: Defending the Integrity of Women's Sports | Riley Gaines
SUMMARY: Don’t miss this episode of The Sunday Special as we sit down with Riley Gaines, the fearless athlete shaking up the sports world. From her roots in Gallatin, Tennessee, to becoming a swimming sensation at the University of Kentucky, Riley’s journey is nothing short of extraordinary. She has boldly taken a stand against controversial policies allowing biological males in women’s sports, sparking a nationwide debate. We’ll dive into her remarkable career, her fierce advocacy, her outspoken critique of the Biden administration, and her ambitious vision for the future. Tune in for a riveting discussion with Riley Gaines, a true warrior for fairness and integrity in women’s sports.

TITLE: Tom MacDonald's Memorial Day Mission
SUMMARY: Today's Sponsor:

TITLE: Ep. 1973 - Will The West Ever Win Another War?
SUMMARY: Joe Biden’s administration seeks to protect Iran from consequences for their nuclear program; top Democrats can’t remember what Memorial Day commemorates; and the world goes nuts yet again over an Israeli attack on terrorists hiding behind civilians.

TITLE: Ep. 1974 - Raging Bulls***
SUMMARY: The Biden campaign pulls out the stops with a celebrity cameo at the Trump trial by…Robert De Niro; prosecutors close their case against Trump without alleging an actual underlying crime; and the entire media bite again on a Hamas lie.

TITLE: BREAKING: Trump Found Guilty
SUMMARY: Trump found guilty. We are now in uncharted territory. There has never been anything like this in American history. Catch my complete breakdown of the Trump verdict and what this means for the 2024 election.

TITLE: Ep. 1975 - 12 Angry New Yorkers
SUMMARY: The jury is out in Trump’s trial – and we all await a verdict; Joe Biden’s flailing campaign staggers ever onward; and Jill Biden emerges to defend her doddering husband.

TITLE: Ep. 1976 - Trump CONVICTED Of 34 Felonies. Pray For The Republic.
SUMMARY: A jury finds Donald Trump guilty of 34 felonies, and we examine all the legal, political, and social implications of this unprecedented moment.

TITLE: How The Military Went Woke | Pete Hegseth
SUMMARY: Pete Hegseth is a prominent American television personality, author, and military combat veteran. As a co-host of "Fox & Friends Weekend" and a frequent commentator on Fox News, he brings a unique blend of firsthand experience and keen analysis to the discussion of national security, veterans' affairs, and American values. In our conversation today, we’ll explore Pete’s journey from the battlefield to the newsroom and discuss his views on the current state of American politics, as well as the shocking state of the military. We'll also touch on his personal experiences, the lessons he's learned through his service, and his vision for a stronger, more united America.

TITLE: Ep. 1977 - FALLOUT: Trump Convicted…And Still Leading
SUMMARY: After a New York jury convicts Donald Trump on 34 felony counts, the polls show…that he’s still ahead; it’s the holiest month of the year – Pride Month!; and Biden rolls out a Hamas peace proposal to pressure Israel.
